sobre.title: About R.U.M.O
sobre.intro_text: R.U.M.O was created with the goal of offering comprehensive support to immigrants arriving in Brazil, facilitating their adaptation and integration into society. Our mission is to help with document regularization, ensure understanding of Brazilian laws, and open opportunities for work and professional training. The platform also offers information on rights, legal assistance, health, and other essential resources. We provide locators, converters, and updated news to keep immigrants well-informed.

tutorial.faq_contact_q: I would like to contact other immigrants, does the platform provide that?

tutorial.faq_partnership_q: I am a Company and would like to make contact for a partnership, how can I do it?
tutorial.faq_partnership_a: Use the contact form in the footer or the HUB partnerships area.
tutorial.faq_suggestion_q: I would like to suggest features from my perspective as an immigrant, how can I do it?
tutorial.faq_suggestion_a: In the community there is a suggestions section. You can also send it by email.

termos.title: Terms and Conditions of Use
termos.welcome: Welcome to R.U.M.O - Unified Mobility and Orientation Network.
termos.intro: These Terms and Conditions of Use ("Terms") govern the access and use of the R.U.M.O platform ("Platform"), accessible via web and mobile devices. By creating an account or using our services, the user ("You", "User") agrees to comply with these Terms. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use the Platform.
termos.section1_content: R.U.M.O aims to offer comprehensive support to immigrants arriving in Brazil, facilitating their adaptation and integration. The Platform offers information services, utilities (such as converters and maps), and a support network for document regularization and employment opportunities.
termos.section2_intro: To access certain features, such as posting on the HUB or using the Document Vault, you must create an account.
termos.section2_1_pf: Individual: Requires the provision of full name, email, and valid CPF (Tax ID).
termos.section2_1_pj: Legal Entity (NGOs/Companies): Requires the provision of company name, business email, and valid CNPJ (Company Tax ID).
termos.section2_2_content: You warrant that all information provided during registration is true, accurate, and current. The use of false or third-party documents may result in immediate account suspension and applicable legal action.
termos.section2_3_content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password. R.U.M.O is not responsible for any loss or damage resulting from unauthorized access to your account.
termos.section3_1_intro: The HUB allows viewing and posting news, employment opportunities, and information from NGOs and Government.
termos.section3_1_content: User Content: When creating a "New Post", you declare that you own the rights to the content or have authorization to share it. Responsibility: R.U.M.O does not guarantee the accuracy of job offers or news posted by third parties. We recommend caution and source verification. Required Information: Publications from NGOs and Federal Bodies must include verifiable contact and location information.
termos.section3_2_intro: The "Document Vault" tool allows you to record issue and expiry dates of personal documents (e.g., Passport, Visa) for personal management.
termos.section3_2_warning: Important Notice: Data entered in the Vault is exclusively for personal deadline organization. These records do NOT replace original documents and do NOT have legal validity as official identification before authorities.
termos.section3_3_content: Currency conversion, measurement, and location tools are provided for informational purposes. R.U.M.O does not guarantee real-time accuracy of exchange rates or geolocation data and is not responsible for financial decisions made based on these tools.

termos.section5_content: All design, logos (including the R.U.M.O brand), institutional texts, and Platform source code are exclusive property of R.U.M.O developers or their licensors. Unauthorized use of these materials is prohibited.
termos.section6_intro: R.U.M.O acts as a facilitator of information and connections. We are not responsible for:
termos.section6_content: Immigration legal processes or government decisions. The quality or safety of jobs posted by third parties. Technical failures in internet or user devices.
termos.section7_content: You may request account deletion at any time through the "Manage Account" page. Data deletion is not immediate, and you will be notified by email before final removal. R.U.M.O reserves the right to suspend accounts that violate these Terms.
